short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts all instances of the horrible name of the new Red Wings stadium to 'Pizzarena'. Logo cred: @jessespecter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The name of the new home of the Red Wings is absolutely awful. This extension will convert all instances of the new not-to-be-uttered name to the term 'Pizzarena'. It just rolls off the tongue, namean. 

This is the most important thing I have ever done. Hit me up at @adhi5000

Completely inspired by 'Rose Gardens Forever'.

Photo cred: @jessespecter.
